en-US.summary: Learn fun facts about world geography.
examplePhrases: Alexa ask world geography facts for a fact
Alexa tell world geography facts to tell me trivia
en-US.name: World Geography Facts
en-US.description:
Ask for world geography Facts, and learn practical geography facts along with fun, fascinating facts.

world geography Facts provides fun the whole family can enjoy and is guaranteed to make you smarter.

To start, just say "Alexa, launch world geography Facts" or "Alexa, open world geography Facts" to get a fact".

At anytime, you can stop by saying "Alexa, stop"
